member.name: T:NAVIS.cAedat16
member.summary: Class for working with aedat files with 16-bit address size

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a file and stores it in aedatFileRows. The file can either have .aedat or .csv extension

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.saveAedat(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{NAVIS.cAedatRow16})
member.summary: Save the loaded information to an aedat file.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.adaptAedat
member.summary: Substracts the minimum timestamp on the file to every event, moving the entire information to the start of the chart.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.getValues
member.summary: Return the event information of the file

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.dataBetweenTimestamps(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns an event list with those who are in the range [rangeInit, rangeEnd]on the original file.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.eventsFiredForEachChannel(System.Collections.Generic.List{NAVIS.cAedatRow16})
member.summary: Returns an array with the number of events fired for each address, based on the list that is used as a parameter.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.eventsFiredTotal(System.Collections.Generic.List{NAVIS.cAedatRow16})
member.summary: Returns the total number of events that are stored in the list used as a parameter.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.maxValueSonogram
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of the sonogram after calculating it.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.generateBitmap(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the sonogram for the loaded file.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.diff2(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the disparity between cochleae fo the loaded file

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.AERSplitter(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates splits using the noise tolerance and noise threshold values from the input parameters.

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.averageBetweenTimestamps(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns the average activity for both cochleae within the [init, end] timestamp range

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.AERSplitterManual(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Saves a new aedat file with the events within the [init, end] timestamp range to the path chosen by the user

member.name: M:NAVIS.cAedat16.saveStereoToMono(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{NAVIS.cAedatRow16})
member.summary: Saves the mono information taken from an stereo sound to an aedat file
